title: Rich Versioning & Human-in-the-Loop Diff Review
description: Major upgrade bringing full historical visibility, semantic diffs, and enhanced model stability.

features.name: Artifact & KG Versioning
features.description: Explorable history for artifacts and Knowledge Graph (KG vX badge). View past iterations directly in the sidebar with read-only previews.

features.name: Advanced Diff Review
features.description: Rich Human-in-the-Loop (HITL) approval flow. New nodes are highlighted in Green, modified in Amber, and removed in Red. AI-generated semantic summaries for large changes.

features.name: LLM Fallback & Stability
features.description: Automatic fallback to OpenAI (GPT-4o) if Anthropic services are unavailable. Standardized project paths and fixed critical NameError bugs.

features.name: Refined Workspace UX
features.description: The workbench has received a significant visual and functional overhaul. Features include a unified Product Panel for viewing Backlog and Release Notes, glassmorphism-inspired detail cards, and an automated view-switching system that ensures the most relevant graph or workflow is always visible.

features.name: Strategic Tools
features.description: Direct GitHub integration for creating feature requests and managing issue comments from within the workspace.

title: Methodology Intake, Project Hydration & Enterprise Branding
description: Major deployment featuring the new Knowledge Architecture, automatic project hydration, and acceptable Enterprise Branding system.

features.name: Project Hydration Architecture
features.description: Automatic enrichment of customer models with best practices using a new Knowledge Repository and structured guides.

features.name: Enterprise Branding System
features.description: Configurable client identity system supporting scoped aesthetics (standard vs. pill-shaped interactive elements) and unified color schemes.

features.name: Enhanced Supervisor
features.description: Implemented mandatory two-step orientation and handoff validation for robust agent orchestration.

features.name: Knowledge Graph Visualization
features.description: Deep methodology rendering in the details panel with intelligent artifact link suggestions and resolved scroll leakage.

features.name: New Tools & Modules
features.description: Added lookup_detailed_knowledge and save_external_context tools, plus new project_model.py for state management.

features.name: Infrastructure Improvements
features.description: Robust git-based versioning with Docker support and fixed async tool invocation errors.
